TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NUnit3XmlOutputWriter extends NUnitLite.Runner.OutputWriter

Docs.summary: NUnit3XmlOutputWriter is responsible for writing the results of a test to a file in NUnit 3.0 format.
